sentences.sContent: I have never engaged in drug trafficking.
sentences.sCn: 我从来没有从事过贩毒。

sentences.sContent: ...and there is some evidence that doctors engage in "defensive medicine" by performing tests and treatments primarily to prove they are not negligent should they get sued...
...But the study warns that it is teenagers who engage in all three of these practices in the extreme who are truly in jeopardy...
...psychologists coined the term "workplace telepressure" to describe an employee's urge to immediately respond to emails and engage in obsessive thoughts about returning an email to one's boss...
...Compared with early generations we spend more and more time working and have less and less free time to engage in leisure pursues...
...the same motivation that can push people to exert more effort in a constructive way could also motivate people to be more likely to engage in unethical behaviors...
...we engage in two types of comparison...
...One group was left undistracted while the other had to engage in a conversation using a speakerphone...

synos.tran: 吸引，占用；使参加；雇佣；使订婚；预定
从事；答应，保证；交战；啮合

words.tran: 保证；约定；同…订婚（engage的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: If you engage in an activity, you do it or are actively involved with it
